<NEW>

That erupted in a laugh over from DINOBOT, "Oh, yes.  One memb=
er of your team whom got a teammate killed, and another for whom is directl=
y threatening the others.  You seem to have an excellent taste in comrades,=
 CONVOY."  Hissing over at the MAXIMALS.

"Regardless, make up your mind?  =
What will it be, Maximals?  Will you be threatening us for every single wor=
d exchanged and threatening to assault us while out of the other end of you=
r vocalizer saying you need our help?  If you wish our assistance, decide w=
hat it will be.  That requires you to eitehr cooperate with us and make a g=
ood show or you can go into the jungle on your own."

DINOBOT was baiting, =
attempting to drive a wedge between the MAXIMALS to either force LEO PRIME =
to discipline them and undermine his authority, or letting them go on which=
 would probably lead to greater and greater tension in the field, and would=
 give the PREDACONS more changes for disruption should they find a way to a=
bandon the MAXIMALS.  Or to get LEO PRIME to admit more of what was going o=
n.

Finally, DINOBOT went to up the escalation, taking over the cue of nego=
tiation from HYDRAS.  "And for our cooperation in this we have a price.  A =
stasis pod with an intact protoform and a spark.  There will be no basis fo=
r negotiation otherwise.  It would have been free given  the necessity,b ut=
 given your troops have not even entered the combat zone and are pointing f=
ully armed weapons at us and threatening assault when we have given no thre=
at ourselves, there is now a price for our cooperation.  Since clearly we c=
annot trust Maximal honor from a leader whom has no qualms about permitting=
 his own personal troops to do as they wish and threaten a parlay he himsel=
f invited.  So, you wish our cooperation, pay our hand for it or go in on y=
our own."

OOC - Anyways, Hydras/Leo Prime, this is DINOBOT taking a cue to=
 try and drive a wedge further into the Maximals and Leo Prime's authority,=
 given they're giving him a rather significant opening, and given his data =
files over on them.  He's going to try and bait them directly to either dis=
rupt things for further chaos later.  IT's a more subtle and Predacon thing=
 to do, so I'll let you decide where to run with it.  And Hydras, request y=
ou let DINOBOT play it out then given you would probably trust him in this =
and it humilaites the Maximals as well.
